feedback:
Excellent application of the DRIVER framework throughout your work. You clearly demonstrated 6 stages: D, R, I, V, E, R2.


STRENGTHS:
- Financial APP: The student demonstrates a functioning financial application: it logs transactions, calculates monthly averages/predictions, compares against a budget, and updates Google Sheets via an AI-driven add-entry workflow. Implementation and reflection evidence show the tool was built, debugged, and successfully writes updates, meeting the financial-app criterion.
- Integrate AI: The student demonstrates an effective AI integration: they designed a system message and agent using GPT-4.1-mini, connected the agent to Google Sheets via an add-entry tool and JavaScript transformation, and iterated until the agent produced and updated outputs. This shows the AI adds functional value (automated logging and prediction) rather than being superficial.

criteria.criterion_name: Financial APP: The tool functions as a financial application.
evidence: "I wanted to subside a budget of $2,000 with my real future rent, which is going to be $1,200 here."
"you see some JavaScript here um in between this AI agent and then some transformations into Google Sheets." / "this code in JavaScript I believe calculates the averages."
"but then updating the row in the sheet is what eventually happened."
criteria.driver_alignment:
- Discover: identified a concrete personal finance need (budget vs rent) that motivated the tool.
- Implement: built and described working components (JavaScript averaging, AI agent, Google Sheets integration, add-entry workflow).
- Reflect: iterated through failures and achieved a working update-to-sheet solution, indicating a functioning application.
criteria.reasoning: The student demonstrates a functioning financial application: it logs transactions, calculates monthly averages/predictions, compares against a budget, and updates Google Sheets via an AI-driven add-entry workflow. Implementation and reflection evidence show the tool was built, debugged, and successfully writes updates, meeting the financial-app criterion.

criteria.criterion_name: Integrate AI: The tool integrates AI capabilities effectively.
evidence: "The AI agent is connected to a Google sheet and has access to the ad entry tool, which we see at the bottom here."
"you see some JavaScript here um in between this AI agent and then some transformations into Google Sheets."
"I eventually got to message my AI through this and get these outputs for my December data."
criteria.driver_alignment: Implement — student describes JavaScript bridging an AI agent and Google Sheets and code to calculate averages; Discover — chose a real-world personal finance use-case to guide integration; Reflect — iterated through failures to reach a working AI-driven workflow.
criteria.reasoning: The student demonstrates an effective AI integration: they designed a system message and agent using GPT-4.1-mini, connected the agent to Google Sheets via an add-entry tool and JavaScript transformation, and iterated until the agent produced and updated outputs. This shows the AI adds functional value (automated logging and prediction) rather than being superficial.
